column4: I'm trying to install ubuntu on my imac g3, i insert the disc i just burnt and turn it on it makes some noises then spits it out. Anything i should be pressing or something?
is your imac a ppc one?
i believe it is a ppc one its about 7-8 years old. i have downloaded 6.06.1 alternate ppc though
ah, I was about to recommend use the ppc disk. Thats all I had sorry
